page.title: 15Labour-saving devices
page.content: In summer term 1985 the Upper Juniors of Bugbrooke Primary school did a bit for the Domesday Survey. This piece of information is taken from 57 families.The scores over 100% show that some people have more than one of an object. Telephone-135%*** Iron -119%*** Microwave- 22%*** Cooker -114%*** wash mach-101%***elec kettle-119%*** Toaster - 63%***deep frier - 40%*** sl cooker- 29%***freezer -105%*** dish wash- 8%*** fridge -110%*** drier - 63%***vac cleaner-108%*** Tea maker- 7%***coff maker - 17%*** sandwich"- 10%***Waffle " - 1%*** foodmixer- 19%***
